text.lobby.welcome_to_default: Welcome to the default dimension, please use the /lobby, /fishing or /mining command to change to a different dimension.
text.lobby.welcome_to_lobby: Welcome to the lobby, please use the /spawn, /fishing or /mining command to change to a different dimension.
text.lobby.welcome_to_mining: Welcome to the minining dimension, please use the /spawn, /fishing or /lobby command to change to a different dimension.
text.lobby.welcome_to_fishing: Welcome to the fishing dimension, please use the /spawn, /lobby or /mining command to change to a different dimension.
text.lobby.failed_already_in_dimension: Failed to teleport, because you are already in the %1$s dimension!
text.lobby.failed_cooldown: Failed to teleport to %1$s, you can use the teleport command again in %2$s secs!
text.lobby.transfer_to_lobby: Please wait, you will be automatically transported to the lobby! If not please use the /lobby command instead.
text.lobby.unable_to_teleport: Unable to teleport to %1$s, because %2$s dimension is not loaded!
